content: अवहारः [अवहृ-कर्तरि ण <ls>P. III. 1. 141</ls>] {@--1@} A thief. {@--2@} A shark, a waterelephant. {@--3@} Taking away the wealth of invited Brāhmaṇas. {@--4@} Temporary cessation of hostilities, suspension of arms, truce. {@--5@} Removing to the camp; ततोऽवहारं सैन्यानां तव तेषां च भारत <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--6@} Cessation, stop (in general). {@--7@} Summoning, inviting. {@--8@} Any object fit to be brought near (उपनेतव्यं). {@--9@} Apostacy, abandoning a sect or caste. {@--10@} Re-delivery, redeeming.
